ai-patthana23.17:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.17:0.3_0: body, speech, and mind in the past,
ai-patthana23.17:1.1_0: Not skilled in the presently for the sake of profitable states,
ai-patthana23.17:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana23.17:2.1_0: Similarly instances the sixteenth section dealing with uninterruptedness, in between the sixteenth part of the succession. There is no danger, when sixteen bases were no friends.
ai-patthana23.17:3.1_0: Not unskillful qualities arise in the past, future, or present.
ai-patthana23.17:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.17:4.1_0: Not skilled in what is skillful, no cause or conditioned by understanding.
ai-patthana23.17:5.1_0: Not unskillful qualities arise in the present, or in the future.
ai-patthana23.17:5.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
